name: Alien Shooter(temporary name)
description:
This game is a simple shooter game where you shoot at aliens. 

A future update could bring with it a story mode, but at the moment the game is only you shooting at aliens. But it doesn't really matter, because shooting at aliens is fun, even without a story mode!

The game is made along a Game Engine that I create based on monogame.

The game can be play with your keyboard or with a controller ( only the Xbox one was tested for now ).

I recommend using one keyboard and one controller, or 2 controllers, while playing in 2-Players mode. Key binding for two players is not well set !

Controls  ( In solo ) :

  • Press  Arrow keys to move or right stick on controller
  • Press Space to shoot or A on controller ( Validate button on UI )
  • Press B to use an energy shield or B on controller
  • Press Enter to pause the game or Start on controller

Controls ( In 2 players ) :

  • Player one :
    • Use Q,Z,S,D keys to move or right stick on controller 
    • Press Space to shoot or A on controller ( Validate button on UI )
    • Press B to use an energy shield or B on controller
    • Press P to pause the game or Start on controller
  • Player two :
    • Use arrow keys to move or right stick on controller 
    • Press + to shoot or A on controller ( Validate button on UI )
    • Press Number3 to use an energy shield or B on controller
    • Press Enter to pause the game or Start on controller

Credits :

  • UI : Kenney.nl
  • Music :  remaxim on OpenGameArt
  • Graphism : https://ansimuz.itch.io/spaceship-shooter-environment
